result.markdown: --- title: "About" execute: freeze: true --- This project is an entry for [Posit 2024 Table Contest](https://posit.co/blog/announcing-the-2024-table-contest/). An alternative link to the website is available [here](https://ahasoplakus.github.io/shifter/). References - [ICH E3 Structure and Content of Clinical Study Report](https://www.ema.europa.eu/en/documents/scientific-guideline/ich-e-3-structure-and-content-clinical-study-reports-step-5_en.pdf) - [An Effective way to produce a Shift Table](https://www.lexjansen.com/pharmasug-cn/2016/PG/PharmaSUG-China-2016-PG05.pdf) - [Producing Clinical Laboratory Shift Tables From ADaM Data](https://www.pharmasug.org/proceedings/2011/CC/PharmaSUG-2011-CC01.pdf) - [Tables in Clinical Trial with R](https://rconsortium.github.io/rtrs-wg/) - [Tidy Design Principles](https://design.tidyverse.org/) - [The Design Philosophy of Great Tables](https://posit-dev.github.io/great-tables/blog/design-philosophy/) R Packages Used - [dplyr](https://github.com/tidyverse/dplyr/) - [tidyr](https://github.com/tidyverse/tidyr/) - [purrr](https://github.com/tidyverse/purrr/) - [stringr](https://github.com/tidyverse/stringr/) - [rlang](https://github.com/r-lib/rlang/) - [gt](https://github.com/rstudio/gt/) - [here](https://github.com/r-lib/here/) - [pharmaverseadam](https://github.com/pharmaverse/pharmaverseadam/) - [DT](https://github.com/rstudio/DT) (to display intermediate datasets) *The `hex` sticker of the website was made using [hexmake](https://github.com/ColinFay/hexmake/)* Session Info ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} sessioninfo::session_info("installed") ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` ─ Session info ─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────── setting value version R
